      • _errorStrategyFac

        private IStrategyFac<IBallCmd> _errorStrategyFac
        A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates. Either use the _errorStrategyFac variable directly if you need a factory that makes an error strategy, or call _errorStrategyFac.make() to create an instance of a beeping error strategy.

      • _errorPaintStrategyFac

        private IPaintStrategyFac _errorPaintStrategyFac
        A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates. Either use the _errorPaintStrategyFac variable directly if you need a factory that makes an error strategy, or call _errorPaintStrategyFac.make() to create an instance of a beeping error strategy.

      • loadStrategy

        private IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> loadStrategy(java.lang.String className)
        Part if the following code in the loadBall(String) function is derived from "https://www.clear.rice.edu/comp310/JavaResources/dynamic_class_load.html", which accords with the homework instruction The following method returns an IUpdateStrategy, given a fully qualified class name (package.classname) of a subclass of ABall. The method assumes that there is only one constructor for the supplied class that has the same *number* of input parameters as specified in the args array and that it conforms to a specific signature, i.e. specific order and types of input parameters in the args array.
        Parameters:
        className - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object
        Returns:
        An instance of IUpdateStrategy

      • loadPaintStrategy

        private IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrategy(java.lang.String className)
        Part if the following code in the loadBall(String) function is derived from "https://www.clear.rice.edu/comp310/JavaResources/dynamic_class_load.html", which accords with the homework instruction The following method returns an instance of IPaintStrategy, given a fully qualified class name (package.classname) of a subclass of ABall. The method assumes that there is only one constructor for the supplied class that has the same *number* of input parameters as specified in the args array and that it conforms to a specific signature, i.e. specific order and types of input parameters in the args array.
        Parameters:
        className - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object
        Returns:
        An instance of IPaintStrategy

      • makeballs

        public void makeballs(IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> s1,
                      IPaintStrategy p1)
        This method add an ABall loaded by the loadBall method to the dispatcher
        Parameters:
        s1 - The strategy that the ball to be made will use
        p1 - paint Strategy that the ball uses to paint

      • clearballs

        public void clearballs()
        This method clear all of the balls on the canvas by deleting all the sprites in the dispatcher

      • makeStrategyFac

        public IStrategyFac<IBallCmd> makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if classname is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
        Returns:
        A factory to make that strategy

      • makePaintStrategyFac

        public IPaintStrategyFac makePaintStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IPaintStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if classname is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - The provided classname for paintstrategy
        Returns:
        Paint factory to make a paintstrategy

      • fixNameUpdate

        public java.lang.String fixNameUpdate(java.lang.String classname)
        Fix the name for an updatestrategy
        Parameters:
        classname - text in textField
        Returns:
        can be used in reflection

      • fixNamePaint

        public java.lang.String fixNamePaint(java.lang.String classname)
        Fix the name for a paintstrategy
        Parameters:
        classname - text in textInput
        Returns:
        fixed name of a paintstrategy

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IStrategyFac<IBallCmd> combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac1,
                                                  IStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac2)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()'s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either factory is null, then a factory for a beeping error strategy is returned.
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        stratFac2 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac for the composition of the two strategies

      • SetSwitcherStrategy

        public void SetSwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> strategy)
        this function will switch a ball to a new state
        Parameters:
        strategy - newStrategy needed to be updated
